reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits beautifully and is well-made, with one mentioning it comes down just over the butt. They describe it as gorgeous, with one noting it's stylish enough to wear out, and another mentioning it shows off the figure. Customers appreciate its warmth, wonderful color, and comfort, with one noting it's not scratchy. However, several customers report that the sweater runs very small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and warm
items.body: I have had this top for a couple season now and it has held up perfectly. It is made with great quality, thick and heavy, perfect for cold weather. The color has not faded and is as advertised. I love that it is sexy and modest. Read more
items.author: BeckahC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!
items.body: This sweater is well made, not too thick, not too thin. It does run small. I usually wear a Med-Lg in tops, however after reading multiple reviews I ordered an X-Lg and it fit perfectly! Read more
items.author: ACarter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but worth it
items.body: So flattering and sexy. I fit in on my travels to Europe! Expensive, but it was worth it Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice and fits but sheds. Price point should be lower.
items.body: Really like the color, fit and overall it looks like the picture. Removed a star because the shedding straight out of the bag is ridiculous. Little tiny white balls of fluff that appear to be coming from inside the sweater. I shook it a little and that's all it takes to make it shed. I question how long it will be able to last and will edit this review if there are any issues with longevity. The price point should be much lower. Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and quality
items.body: LOVE IT! I have it tan and green/grey. I have had the grey one for two years and it still looks great. The quality is awesome. It washes and wears well. It is not thick, but it is not so thin you can see imperfections through it. Wears nice with leggings or jeans. I always get a ton of compliments. I will be buying a third color! Read more
items.author: Nadine R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall ladies rejoice!
items.body: I'm 5'10" with a 6'2" wing span. I was expecting to make a rough pattern out of this to make my own, but I don't have to! It is actually long enough for me. I usually go with medium, but the reviews said it ran small so I got a large and that was a good decision, as it's still snug. Not super stretchy so a little gymnastics was required to get it off. And the fabric was actually a knit a better quality than I expected. I might buy another in a different color... Read more
items.author: Diana Leach

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but tight and long
items.body: I’m 5’4” and 160lbs. I have purchased several things from this designer over the years. She’s pricey but always high quality, soft, classy, and last for years. I normally wear a large in her tops but this one was extremely tight. I would recommend sizing up. If you’re tall it will fit at a proper length for jeans. If you’re shorter this should fit with leggings as a sweater dress. Unfortunately, the v-neck was more of a plunging neckline and not appropriate for work. It would however be cute as a date night dress for me. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it !
items.body: I love this sweater ! The color the length the fit it’s amazing !!!!!!! The thickness is perfect it will keep me warm but it’s not bulky . Size is perfect Read more
items.author: Chandra

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Medium Grey, Blue, Crimson Red, Greyish Turquoise, Purple, Black, Light Grey, Deep Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
